content: गंडः {@--1@} The cheek, the whole side of the face including the temples; गंडाभोगे पुलकपटलं <ls>Māl. 2. 5</ls>; तदीषदार्द्रारुणगंडलेखं <ls>Ku. 7. 82</ls>; <ls>Me. 26</ls>, <ls n="Me.">92</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 81</ls>; <ls>Rs. 4. 6</ls>; <ls n="Rs.">6. 10</ls>; <ls>Ś. 6. 17</ls>; <ls>Śi. 12. 54.</ls> {@--2@} An elephant's temple; <ls>Māl. 1. 1.</ls> {@--3@} A bubble. {@--4@} A boil, tumour, swelling, pimple; अयमपरो गंडस्योपरि विस्फोटः <ls>Mu. 5</ls>; तदा गंडस्योपरि पिटिका संवृत्ता <ls>Ś. 2.</ls> {@--5@} Goitre and other excrescences of the neck. {@--6@} A joint, knot. {@--7@} A mark, spot. {@--8@} A rhinoceros. {@--9@} The bladder. {@--10@} A hero, warrior. {@--11@} Part of a horse's trappings, a stud or button fixed as an ornament upon the harness. {@--12@} An unexpected combination of words consisting in putting one speech immediately after another, so as to be syntactically connected; see वीथि; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} राक्षसः -अपि नाम चाणक्यबटुः -दौ-जयतु-रा. अतिसंधातुं शक्यः स्यात्. -दौ. अमात्यः <ls>Mu. 4</ls>; so किमस्या न प्रेयो यदि पुनरसह्यस्तु विरहः. -दौ. देव उपस्थितः <ls>U. 1</ls> {@--13@} The tenth yoga or one of the twenty-seven portions of a circle on the plane of the ecliptic. {@--14@} An astronomical period.
